function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate air filtration systems for pathogen propagation","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne virus transmission and disease spread","Mitigation":"Use of high-efficiency air filtration systems and routine maintenance","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV germicidal irradiation, photocatalytic oxidation, demand-controlled ventilation","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building developers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of indoor air pollution monitoring and control","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality leading to health issues and reduced productivity","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of air pollutants and implementation of demand-controlled ventilation systems","Technologies":"Real-time air quality monitoring sensors, demand-controlled ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building developers, facility managers"}]}
